label: AB2C6D_hP20_163_c_f_i_a-001
title: $\beta$-Na$_{2}$GeTeO$_{6}$ Structure
comments: There is also a rhombohedral form of this structure, $\alpha$-Na$_{2}$GeTeO$_{6}$, \href{current_web_home_dir/AB3C_hR10_148_c_f_c-001}{in the FeTiO$_{3}$ ($E2_{2}$) structure}.  This is the structure for $\alpha$-Na$_{2}$GeTeO$_{6}$ given in Woodward, 1999), but the Wyckoff position labeled (12i) is actually (18f). The ICSD entry gives the correct structure.
